#labels Installation
1. Download and Install Gentics Portal.Node SDK
	http://www.gentics.com

   Or use the newes Version of Eclipse instead
	http://www.eclipse.org/downloads/
	Eclipse IDE for Java EE Developers

2. Download SubClipse and install 
	http://subclipse.tigris.org/install.html


3. Checkout the projects you want to use
	http://code.google.com/p/gtxcontentconnector/source/checkout

Get in touch with your Gentics Customer Contact and request the Portal Connector API and the required libs for the ContentConnector Suite. If you are in a Gentics Portal.Node SDK the libraries are located in GPN_LIBs (Variable).
